title: Virus Visualizer
shortDescription: Tracks and sorts the viral outbreak
description: This website allows users to view the viral outbreak through charts. Users can search states and nations and sort by total or daily cases. They can also view public health resources for each state and see relevant news.

title: Item Lister
shortDescription: An app for sharing and mapping moments and photos
description: This mobile app was built with Flutter and Dart and includes many user-facing capabilities, including logging in, photo storage, and geocoding. Users can post and bookmark anything that is of interest to them.

title: The Digital Curator
description: I was inspired to create this in order to store information that I frequently refer back to, and to list books I find interesting. This site allows contributions from logged-in users and is connected to two different databases.

title: Hacker News Reader
shortDescription: Searches and sorts articles from Hacker News
description: Searches and displays articles by pulling data from API endpoints. Also allows sorting of articles by article properties.
